name: 𝚂𝙽𝙴𝙷𝙰𝙱𝙷𝙸 𝙼𝚄𝚂𝙸𝙲 𝙿𝙻𝙰𝚈𝙴𝚁
description: 𝚂𝙽𝙴𝙷𝙰𝙱𝙷𝙸 𝙼𝚄𝚂𝙸𝙲 𝙿𝙻𝙰𝚈𝙴𝚁 𝙰𝙻𝙻𝙾𝚆 𝚃𝙾 𝙿𝙻𝙰𝚈 𝙼𝚄𝚂𝙸𝙲 𝚃𝙾 𝚅𝙲.

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram session string

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token from @BotFather

BOT_NAME.description: fill with your music bot name.

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

DATABASE_URL.description: fill with the mongodb url you get from cloud.mongodb.com

LOG_CHANNEL.description: create a private channel and get the channel id, add your bot as admin to the channel too

BOT_USERNAME.description: fill with your bot username without @

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: fill with the assistant username without @

SUDO_USERS.description: fill with the user id who can access all function in your bot (separate with space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: max duration for music to download (in minutes).
